languages.text: "Не знаю, Ваша Светлость, только летело страшно быстро, я таких пушек раньше не видала. И били далеко — чуть ли не из-за линии... в смысле из-за горизонта. Кто же этим сквернавцам дал такую жуткую штуковину?"

traits.locale_text: "Не знаю, Ваша Милость, только летело страшно быстро, я таких пушек раньше не видал. И били далеко — чуть ли не из-за линии... в смысле из-за горизонта. Кто же этим сквернавцам дал такую жуткую штуковину?"

languages.text: "Can't say I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the shots it fires certainly fly quick. I've never seen guns like that before. And they were firing from far away — almost from beyond the bar... the horizon, that is. Who gave those yobs a terrifying contraption like that?"
languages.original_text: "Не знаю, Ваша Светлость, только летело страшно быстро, я таких пушек раньше не видала. И били далеко — чуть ли не из-за линии... в смысле из-за горизонта. Кто же этим сквернавцам дал такую жуткую штуковину?"

traits.locale_text: "Can't say I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the shots it fires sure fly quick. I've never seen guns like that before. And they were firing from so far away — almost from beyond the bar... the horizon, that is. Who gave those yobs a terrible hickey like that?"

"Can't say I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the shots it fires sure fly quick. I've never seen guns like that before. And they were firing from so far away — almost from beyond the bar... the horizon, that is. Who gave those yobs a terrible hickey like that?"

"Can't say I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the shots it fires sure fly quick. I've never seen guns like that before. And they were firing from miles away — almost from beyond the bar... the horizon, that is. Who gave those yobs a terrifying contraption like that?"

"Can't say I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the shots it fires sure fly quick. I've never seen guns like that before. And they were firing from miles away — almost from beyond the bar... the horizon, that is. Who gave those yobs a terrifying contraption like that?"

"Can't say I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the shots it fires certainly fly quick. I've never seen guns like that before. And they were firing from miles away — almost from beyond the bar... the horizon, that is. Who gave those yobs a terrifying contraption like that?"

"Can't say I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the shots it fires certainly fly quick. I've never seen guns like that before. And they were firing from miles away — almost from beyond the bar... the horizon, that is. Who gave those yobs a terrifying contraption like that?"

languages.text: "Das weiß ich nicht, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, aber ihre Schüsse fliegen ausgesprochen schnell. Ich habe noch nie solche Waffen gesehen. Und sie haben aus großer Entfernung gefeuert, fast von jenseits der Bar- ... jenseits des Horizonts. Wer hat diesen Halbstarken so eine grauenhafte Waffe gegeben?"
languages.original_text: "Can't say I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the shots it fires certainly fly quick. I've never seen guns like that before. And they were firing from far away — almost from beyond the bar... the horizon, that is. Who gave those yobs a terrifying contraption like that?"

traits.locale_text: "Das weiß ich nicht, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, aber ihre Schüsse fliegen verdammt schnell. Ich habe noch nie eine solche Waffe gesehen. Und sie haben aus kilometerweiter Entfernung gefeuert, fast von jenseits der Bar- ... jenseits des Horizonts. Wer hat diesen Halbstarken so eine grauenhafte Waffe gegeben?"

languages.text: « Aucune idée, Votre Seigneurie... mais la cadence de tir est rapide, pour sûr ! J'avais encore jamais vu de pétoires de ce calibre, et quelle portée ! Presque depuis l'horizon. Qui a refilé un armement pareil à ces guignols ? »
languages.original_text: "Can't say I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the shots it fires certainly fly quick. I've never seen guns like that before. And they were firing from far away — almost from beyond the bar... the horizon, that is. Who gave those yobs a terrifying contraption like that?"

traits.locale_text: « Aucune idée, Votre Seigneurie... mais leur cadence de tir est rapide, pour sûr ! J'avais encore jamais vu des pétoires de ce calibre, et quelle portée ! Presque depuis l'horizon. Qui a refilé un armement pareil à ces guignols ? »

languages.text: “我说不好，大人，但那枚炮弹飞得真够快的。我以前从来没见过那样的大炮，他们在很远的地方开了火，几乎位于那条杠的那一头……我是说，地平线的那一头。是谁把这么可怕的玩意儿交到了那群混蛋手里？”
languages.original_text: "Can't say I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the shots it fires certainly fly quick. I've never seen guns like that before. And they were firing from far away — almost from beyond the bar... the horizon, that is. Who gave those yobs a terrifying contraption like that?"

traits.locale_text: “我说不好，大人，但那枚炮弹飞得太快了。我以前从来没见过那样的大炮，他们在几里之外就开了火，几乎位于那条杠的那一头……我是说，地平线的那一头。是谁把这么可怕的玩意儿交到了那群混蛋手里？”

languages.text: 「陛下、正体は分かりませんが、アレの発射速度は確実に速かったです。あのような銃は見たことがありません。そのうえ、遠く離れた場所から発射していました。もはや、ありえない…地平線の向こうからです。誰があんな不届き者にあれほど恐ろしい装置を与えたのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Can't say I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the shots it fires certainly fly quick. I've never seen guns like that before. And they were firing from far away — almost from beyond the bar... the horizon, that is. Who gave those yobs a terrifying contraption like that?"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、正体は分かりませんが、アレの発砲速度は確実に速かったです。あのような銃は見たことがありません。そのうえ、何マイルも離れたところから発砲していました。もはや、ありえない…地平線の向こうからです。誰があんな不届き者にあれほど恐ろしい装置を与えたのでしょう？」

languages.text: «No puedo decir que lo sepa, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero sí sé que los disparos que hace son muy rápidos. Nunca había visto armas así. Y disparaban desde una distancia inmensa, casi desde más allá de la línea... del horizonte. ¿Quién les ha dado a esos maleantes un artilugio tan aterrador como ese?».
languages.original_text: "Can't say I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the shots it fires certainly fly quick. I've never seen guns like that before. And they were firing from far away — almost from beyond the bar... the horizon, that is. Who gave those yobs a terrifying contraption like that?"

traits.locale_text: «No puedo decir que lo sepa, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero los disparos que hace son muy rápidos. Nunca había visto armas así. Y disparaban desde kilómetros de distancia, casi desde más allá de la línea... del horizonte. ¿Quién les ha dado a esos maleantes un artilugio tan aterrador como ese?».

languages.text: "Bilemiyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama belli ki bayağı hızlı atıyor. Ömrümde böyle silah görmedim. Bir de çok çok uzaktan sıkıyorlar, ta ebe... Şey, ufkun ötesinden. Böyle dehşet bir zamazingo, o hödüklerin eline nasıl düşmüş?"
languages.original_text: "Can't say I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the shots it fires certainly fly quick. I've never seen guns like that before. And they were firing from far away — almost from beyond the bar... the horizon, that is. Who gave those yobs a terrifying contraption like that?"

traits.locale_text: "Bilemiyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama belli ki bayağı hızlı atıyor. Ömrümde böyle silah görmedim. Bir de çok çok uzaktan sıkıyorlar, ta ebe... Şey, ufkun ötesinden. Böyle dehşet bir zamazingo, o hödüklerin eline nasıl düşmüş?"
